verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H94>Agur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3348>Jakeh,<s%> even the <S%H4853>prophecy:<s%> the <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H5002>spoke<s%> unto <S%H384>Ithiel,<s%> even unto <S%H384>Ithiel<s%> and <S%H401>Ucal,<s%>
Surely <S%H3588><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am more <S%H1198>brutish<s%> than any <S%H4480>man,<s%> <S%H376><s%> and have <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H998>understanding<s%> of a <S%H120>man.<s%>
I <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3925>learned<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> nor <S%H3045>have<s%> the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> hath ascended <S%H5927>up<s%> into <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> or <S%H3381>descended?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> in his <S%H2651>fists?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H6887>bound<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> in a <S%H8071>garment?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H6965>established<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is his <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> is his <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> thou canst <S%H3045>tell?<s%>
Every <S%H3605><s%> <S%H565>word<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> is <S%H6884>pure:<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is a <S%H4043>shield<s%> unto them that put their <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him.
Add <S%H3254><s%> thou <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> his <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H3198>reprove<s%> thee, and thou be found a <S%H3576>liar.<s%>
Two <S%H8147><s%> things have I <S%H7592>required<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> thee; <S%H4513>deny<s%> <S%H4480><s%> me them <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> I die: <S%H4191><s%>

Remove <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me <S%H7723>vanity<s%> and <S%H1697>lies:<s%> <S%H3577><s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H7389>poverty<s%> nor <S%H6239>riches;<s%> <S%H2963>feed<s%> me with <S%H3899>food<s%> <S%H2706>convenient<s%> for me:

Lest <S%H6435><s%> I be <S%H7646>full,<s%> and <S%H3584>deny<s%> thee, and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> or <S%H6435>lest<s%> I be <S%H3423>poor,<s%> and <S%H1589>steal,<s%> and <S%H8610>take<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of my <S%H430>God<s%> in vain.
Accuse <S%H3960><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H113>master,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H7043>curse<s%> thee, and thou be found <S%H816>guilty.<s%>
There is a <S%H1755>generation<s%> that <S%H7043>curseth<s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%> and doth <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> their <S%H517>mother.<s%>
There is a <S%H1755>generation<s%> that are <S%H2889>pure<s%> in their own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and yet is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7364>washed<s%> from their <S%H4480>filthiness.<s%> <S%H6675><s%>
There is a <S%H1755>generation,<s%> O <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H7311>lofty<s%> are their <S%H5869>eyes!<s%> and their <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> are lifted <S%H5375>up.<s%>

There is a <S%H1755>generation,<s%> whose <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are as <S%H2719>swords,<s%> and their jaw <S%H4973>teeth<s%> as <S%H3979>knives,<s%> to <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> from off the <S%H4480>earth,<s%> <S%H776><s%> and the <S%H34>needy<s%> from among <S%H4480>men.<s%> <S%H120><s%>

The <S%H5936>horseleach<s%> hath <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> crying, <S%H3051>Give,<s%> <S%H3051>give.<s%> There are <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2007><s%> things that are <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%> yea, <S%H702>four<s%> things <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> It is enough: <S%H1952><s%>

The <S%H7585>grave;<s%> and the <S%H6115>barren<s%> <S%H7356>womb;<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> that is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H4325>water;<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> It is <S%H1952>enough.<s%>

The <S%H5869>eye<s%> that <S%H3932>mocketh<s%> at his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H936>despiseth<s%> to <S%H3349>obey<s%> his <S%H517>mother,<s%> the <S%H6158>ravens<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> shall pick it <S%H5365>out,<s%> and the <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H5404>eagles<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it.
There be <S%H7969>three<s%> things which are too <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> me, yea, <S%H702>four<s%> which I <S%H3045>know<s%> not: <S%H3808><s%>

The <S%H1870>way<s%> of an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> in the <S%H8064>air;<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> a <S%H6697>rock;<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H591>ship<s%> in the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and the <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H1397>man<s%> with a <S%H5959>maid.<s%>

Such <S%H3651><s%> is the <S%H1870>way<s%> of an <S%H5003>adulterous<s%> <S%H802>woman;<s%> she <S%H398>eateth,<s%> and <S%H4229>wipeth<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H559>saith,<s%> I have <S%H6466>done<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H205>wickedness.<s%>
For <S%H8478><s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> things the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H7264>disquieted,<s%> and <S%H8478>for<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> which it <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> bear: <S%H5375><s%>
For <S%H8478><s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H4427>reigneth;<s%> and a <S%H5036>fool<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he is <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H3899>meat;<s%>
For <S%H8478><s%> an <S%H8130>odious<s%> woman <S%H3588>when<s%> she is <S%H1166>married;<s%> and a <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> is <S%H3423>heir<s%> to her <S%H1404>mistress.<s%>
There be <S%H702>four<s%> things which are <S%H6996>little<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth,<s%> but <S%H1992>they<s%> are exceeding <S%H2449>wise:<s%> <S%H2450><s%>
The <S%H5244>ants<s%> are a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5794>strong,<s%> yet they <S%H3559>prepare<s%> their <S%H3899>meat<s%> in the <S%H7019>summer;<s%>
The <S%H8227>conies<s%> are but a <S%H3808>feeble<s%> <S%H6099><s%> <S%H5971>folk,<s%> yet <S%H7760>make<s%> they their <S%H1004>houses<s%> in the <S%H5553>rocks;<s%>
The <S%H697>locusts<s%> have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4428>king,<s%> yet go they <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them by <S%H2686>bands;<s%>
The <S%H8079>spider<s%> taketh <S%H8610>hold<s%> with her <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and is in <S%H4428>kings'<s%> <S%H1964>palaces.<s%>
There be <S%H7969>three<s%> things which <S%H6806>go<s%> <S%H3190>well,<s%> yea, <S%H702>four<s%> are <S%H3190>comely<s%> in going: <S%H1980><s%>
A <S%H3918>lion<s%> which is <S%H1368>strongest<s%> among <S%H929>beasts,<s%> and turneth not <S%H3808>away<s%> <S%H7725><s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3605>any;<s%>
A <S%H2223>greyhound;<s%> <S%H4975><s%> a he <S%H8495>goat<s%> <S%H176>also;<s%> and a <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> whom there is <S%H408>no<s%> rising <S%H6965>up.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> thou hast done <S%H5034>foolishly<s%> in lifting up <S%H5375>thyself,<s%> or <S%H518>if<s%> thou hast thought <S%H2161>evil,<s%> lay thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon thy <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

Surely <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H4330>churning<s%> of <S%H2461>milk<s%> bringeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2529>butter,<s%> and the <S%H4330>wringing<s%> of the <S%H639>nose<s%> bringeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H1818>blood:<s%> so the <S%H4330>forcing<s%> of <S%H639>wrath<s%> bringeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H7379>strife.<s%>
